description_for_human: Generate diagrams from code or natural language.
description_for_model: Eraser will take code or natural language and draw a diagram that represents the input. Eraser can draw various types of diagrams â sequence diagrams, cloud architecture diagrams, entity relationship diagrams, and flow charts. The output is a link to a PNG file and a link to a web editor where the user can modify the diagram. Use '/n' in place of new lines.
